tweets.text:
2021 in ‚ÄòGreat‚Äô Britain, hailed as a developed country,one of the wealthiest in the world&with top scientists. 
And good old @ClareDinnisEA thinks she can convince me to let this go? Not until hell freezes over @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice https://t.co/yS03VJ5CGv

Breaking News . @EnvAgency have sanctioned the destruction of breeding birds tomorrow at the Lower Otter Restoration Project . This is #HS2 part 2 . PLEASE THINK AGAIN @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest Please follow @WiseBirding and RT https://t.co/I8Wv40YKqy

UPDATE - After the appeal we put out last night to @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup & @NESouthWest there was no nest destruction today at the River Otter Restoration Project in Devon and the partners are reconsidering their plans - thank you . Top work @WiseBirding et al . https://t.co/A8KSk5gcuE

tweets.text: @davemh72 @ollyandpatch @HelenVi00175623 @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @DefraGovUK I only ever had 1 migraine until recently when we started to be exposed to H2S on a daily basis. I forgot how painful migraines are & feel for anyone who is a long-time sufferer. I've had 2 in the past couple of weeks and headaches in between. I hope your wife gets relief soon üôè

@EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @JamesBevanEA @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice 
The compensation of the whole town will cost more than capping and restoring that landfill. Put a stop to this before the health effects get worse @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/y8MrO1hvuQ

To be fair we should be on the @EnvAgency payroll by now, I know every nuance of landfill gas& could produce them a chart to help their sniffers identify which aroma it is on the day in question. May be a bloodhound in my next life @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/FKI5GOO4Ge
